abstract: NFL Roundup; Detroit Lions quarterback Matthew Stafford practices for first time since sustaining ankle injury in game against Atlanta Falcons; other NFL news noted.
snippet: Detroit quarterback Matthew Stafford worked with the first team at practice Thursday, a sign of progress after he hurt his ankle last weekend.
lead_paragraph: Detroit quarterback Matthew Stafford worked with the first team at practice Thursday, a sign of progress after he hurt his ankle last weekend.

headline.print_headline: Lions Are Optimistic As Stafford Practices
headline.seo: Lions’ Stafford Practices on Injured Ankle
